Queen of Hearts:


Welcome! My name is Queen of Hearts, and I only just Aden, who received the title of a paper girl Beer.


I hope our festival will come of interest.


I would love that... Yes there are! I think the Beer Festival will soon gain fame. A lot of people come here to enjoy the atmosphere of joy and merriment that reigns here.


By the way, have You ever brewed beer?


Try it once and see the result. And friends don't forget to share!


Help yourself to the beer, and let this festival bring You happiness!
